Unless you've been living under a rock, you've probably heard of the Black Friday shopping extravaganza.

High street fashion chain River Island is expected to take part in the epic sale event once again - which falls on November 29 this year.

Shoppers can expect to find savings on clothing for women, men, children babies as well as homeware.

Last November the retailer slashed 20% off across all of its ranges, but the discount was only available to shoppers spending £75 or more.

Customers were able to pick up the discounted items online at riverisland.com and in stores nationwide.

Whether you're planning to shop from home or in store this Black Friday, it's best to stay prepared.

Below are our tips for bagging the best deals.

Everything you need to know about River Island's Black Friday sale

(Image: River Island)

The fashion chain is yet to reveal its plans, but here's where to find the best deals online.

Black Friday shopping tips

Follow River Island on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram to find out the latest news.

Opt for standard collection from a River Island store. This is the cheapest delivery method at £1, but is also free when you spend over £20.

Keep checking the brand's dedicated Black Friday page for the latest information and deals.

If you're hitting the shops, be sure to wear appropriate clothing. Flat shoes like trainers and simple light layers will help you shop quick and comfortably.

Check for free delivery codes from sites like Quidco and VoucherCodes.

Keep an eye on our Black Friday page for any updates.
description: The high street fashion chain has remained quiet about its plans for Black Friday - but here are some tips to get you prepared
